outline:
1. rebuke, correction, reproof, punishment, chastisement
  2. argument, reproof
    1. argument, impeachment
    2. reproof, chiding
    3. correction, rebuke
kjv_def: argument, [idiom] chastened, correction, reasoning, rebuke, reproof, [idiom] be (often) reproved.
strongs_def: chastisement; figuratively (by words) correction, refutation, proof (even in defence)
